rooms.description: Open-plan living and kitchen area featuring Chettinad-style elements such as intricate wood carvings on the beams, traditional stone finishes, and vibrant color accents that align with Vastu principles emphasizing open space for energy flow.
Dedicated dining area adjoining the living room, designed to serve as a multipurpose space in line with traditional Chettinad aesthetics and Vastu guidelines for communal spaces.
Private bedroom optimized for rest and meditation, positioned per Vastu to ensure a calm ambiance while incorporating Chettinad ornamental elements.
Compact bathroom with modern amenities integrated within the traditional design framework to maintain balance as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed with Chettinad-style decorative woodwork and in accordance with Vastu for prosperity, positioned on the south side of the villa.
Large east-facing window to invite natural light and positive energy, crafted with traditional design patterns.
